SNiPhunter
  • Search by rs identifier
  • Search by keyword
  • Upload multiple rs IDs
  • API
  • Download SNiPhunter
  • Contact

Calls can be made to SNiPhunter's API using HTTP GET requests.

Example: http://sniphunter.sanbi.ac.za/PMCOAI_rs_articles?rs_number=rs5743810


This will return JSON objects:

[
{
"rs_number": "rs5743810",
"email_address": "apinjohtoby@yahoo.co.uk",
"publication_date": "2013",
"pubmed_id": "3842328",
"doi": "10.1371/journal.pone.0081071",
"pubmed_file_name": "PLoS_One_2013_Nov_27_8(11)_e81071.nxml",
"rs_number_cited_in_article": "3",
"keywords": []
},
{
"rs_number": "rs5743810",
"email_address": "emisch@uw.edu",
"publication_date": "2014",
"pubmed_id": "3791179",
"doi": "10.1038/gene.2013.34",
"pubmed_file_name": "Genes_Immun_2013_Oct_4_14(7)_10_1038_gene_2013_34.nxml",
"rs_number_cited_in_article": "2",
"keywords": [
"polymorphism",
"Legionnairesu2019 Disease"
]
},...
